mapper.select: SELECT FsBoard.id ,FsBoard.title ,FsBoard.content ,FsBoard.deleted ,FsBoard.created_at ,FsBoard.modified_at FROM FsBoard WHERE FsBoard.id = #{id}

SELECT FsBoard.id ,FsBoard.title ,FsBoard.content ,FsBoard.deleted ,FsBoard.created_at ,FsBoard.modified_at FROM FsBoard WHERE FsBoard.id is not null AND FsBoard.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND FsBoard.deleted = #{deleted}

SELECT FsBoard.id ,FsBoard.title ,FsBoard.content ,FsBoard.deleted ,FsBoard.created_at ,FsBoard.modified_at FROM FsBoard WHERE FsBoard.id is not null AND FsBoard.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= FsBoard.created_at AND FsBoard.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND FsBoard.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY FsBoard.created_at ORDER BY FsBoard.title ASC DESC LIMIT #{callpage}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(FsBoard.id) as listsize FROM FsBoard WHERE FsBoard.id is not null AND FsBoard.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= FsBoard.created_at AND FsBoard.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND FsBoard.deleted = #{deleted}
